content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working Remotely\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Employees assigned to Google projects will be physically present at their work location and not working remotely (unless advised otherwise at the outset of the project). If there are extenuating circumstances that require some remote work, this will be evaluated on a case by case basis. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bringing Guests to Google\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Employees are not allowed to bring personal guests to Google at any time. This policy includes, but is not limited to, guests brought onsite for meals or taking meal out of Google offices. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should your case has a business necessity, please verify it with\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFBGOOGAMs@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google Account Managers at EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". According to the Google Visitor Policy, a person with a guest badge should be supervised at all times.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Doing Business with Google\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Employees should never share confidential or Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Even if you have information which is not explicitly noted as confidential or PII, it is highly recommended to follow the 'on a need to know basis' rule when sharing any type of Google related information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is strictly forbidden for EPAM employees to conduct sales/business development activities, to provide unsolicited resumes to Google managers (for existing or new projects), or soliciting employees / workers from other companies to join EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Involvement in such activities could jeopardize EPAM's relationship with the client, and directly impact your employment with EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Addressing Questions, Concerns and Performance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions that are not project or assignment based (i.e. questions about compensation, employment agreements, changing projects, assignment, etc.) those questions should be directed to the EPAM Account Manager only to address. These and other non-project related issues are not topics for EPAM employees to discuss or address with the client. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google Account email signature\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Employees assigned to Google projects will identify their employer in their client's email signature line.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please use the following format and update your signature in @\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://google.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"google.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" accounts.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://docs.google.com/a/google.com/document/d/1AkLEFyClNuSBS2IQKyupx0WNSgFyjgn541injfJg7mY/edit?usp=sharing\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/54ab7b9b-5809-4e99-ac4d-4f5fa75b4fca/image2017-10-31%2017:16:2.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":677,\"height\":124.99999999999999}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google Amenities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Temporary workers, vendors, and contractors may have access to some perks (if available to you at your location) while on assignment at Google. Please do not abuse these privileges: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/53fd2b21-d95b-44bf-8709-2b3a40b60035/GOOG.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":687,\"height\":249}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Google TVC Guide Help Center\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google created a\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.google.com/tvcguide#topic=7420822\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"new resource center\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (accessible with @\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://google.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"google.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"account) to help EPAM employees access and understand the policies and guidance they are expected to comply with while on assignment at Google. We expect you to understand and follow these policies and guidelines, which may change from time to time. In the event you believe any of the policies conflict with any of EPAM's policies, please reach out to your EPAM manager for clarification.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
